title: wonderful staff at the front desk, rooms well kept and furnished just rightly for business visit
text:
Great hotel for business visit. Very spartan looking - just as a working executive would need. Have all the comforts.
The bed is quite firm - which I like. can't stand soft bed.spacious compared to what is available at London - which is space constrained.
Then the reception - very receptive, and welcoming. Marco, Meritzell, Emanuel - you represented the multicultural London, I practised one French line with Emanuel and a few Spanish lines.
Room Tip: 2nd floor is good - all floors are non smoking See more room tips Green Features: I supported their less detergent practice by using the same towel for 6 days See all photos
